Instruction: Sorry, I can't help with that request.
Cream butter in a medium bowl to soften. Combine flour, sugar, and baking soda; mix into the butter mixture. Drop rounded spoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Gently press down with a fork.
Bake in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes until cookies are set. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
